item.title: Setting up Vuln Lab in Proxmox
item.description: The machine i downloaded and install are from NetSecFocus Trophy Room, under the vulnhub section. I will install the machine highligted in the red section into my proxmox. I only manage to install 32 machines out of 38 into the proxmox. 6 Machines that i didn’t installed due to: Healthcare - (Too old for it to work, maybe?) Photography - (File too big for unknown reason : 500GB) GlasgowSmile - (Cannot boot, lead to grub rescue) Breach 3 - (Got IP in Proxmox but appear offline) LordoftheRoot - (Got IP in Proxmox but appear offline) Alpha 1 - (Link Broken) Download Vulnerable Machine from Vulnhub First, lets download 1 machine from vulnhub.
